legacyOptions.rawQuery: SELECT "time_sec" as time, description as text, tags FROM event WHERE $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec) AND tags='deploy' ORDER BY 1 ASC
SELECT "time_sec" as time, description as text, tags FROM event WHERE $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec) AND tags='ticket' ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT 
  $__timeEpoch(time), 
  measurement as text, 
  '' as tags
FROM
  metric_values 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  time, 
  measurement as text, 
  '' as tags
FROM
  metric_values 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY 1

spec.description: Run the postgres unit tests to generate the data backing this dashboard

spec.title: timeGroup macro 5m with fill(10.0)

spec.rawSql: SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(time, '5m', 10.0), avg(value) as value FROM metric WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

spec.title: Metrics - timeGroup macro $summarize with fill(NULL)

spec.rawSql: SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(time, '$summarize', NULL), sum(value) as value FROM metric WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

spec.title: Metrics - timeGroup macro $summarize with fill(100.0)

spec.rawSql: SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(time, '$summarize', 100.0), sum(value) as value FROM metric WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

spec.title: Multiple series with metric column - series mode

spec.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeEpoch(time), measurement, "valueOne", "valueTwo" FROM metric_values 
WHERE $__timeFilter(time) AND measurement in($metric) ORDER BY 1

spec.title: Multiple series without metric column - series mode

spec.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeEpoch(time), "valueOne", "valueTwo" FROM metric_values 
WHERE $__timeFilter(time) AND measurement in($metric) ORDER BY 1

spec.rawSql: SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(time, '$summarize'), avg(value) as value FROM metric WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

spec.title: Multiple series with metric column using timeGroup macro ($summarize)

spec.rawSql:
SELECT 
  $__timeGroupAlias(time, '$summarize'), 
  measurement, 
  avg("valueOne") as "valueOne",
  avg("valueTwo") as "valueTwo"
FROM
  metric_values 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  measurement in($metric)
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1

spec.title: Multiple series without metric column

spec.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeEpoch(time), "valueOne", "valueTwo" FROM metric_values 
WHERE $__timeFilter(time) AND measurement in($metric) ORDER BY 1

spec.title: cast(null as bigint) as time

spec.rawSql: SELECT cast(null as bigint) as time

spec.title: cast(null as datetime) as time

spec.rawSql: SELECT cast(null as timestamp) as time

spec.title: localtimestamp as time

spec.rawSql: SELECT localtimestamp as time

spec.title: NOW() as time

spec.rawSql: SELECT NOW() as time

spec.title: timeGroup macro 5m with fill(previous)

spec.rawSql: SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(time, '5m', previous), avg(value) as value FROM metric WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

spec.title: Metrics - timeGroup macro $summarize with fill(previous)

spec.rawSql: SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(time, '$summarize', previous), sum(value) as value FROM metric WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

spec.title: Multiple series with metric column using unixEpochGroup macro ($summarize)

spec.rawSql:
SELECT 
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias("timeInt32", '$summarize'), 
  measurement, 
  avg("valueOne") as "valueOne",
  avg("valueTwo") as "valueTwo"
FROM
  metric_values 
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter("timeInt32") AND
  measurement in($metric)
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1, 2

spec.title: Multiple series without metric column using timeGroup macro ($summarize)

spec.rawSql:
SELECT 
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias("timeInt32", '$summarize'), 
  avg("valueOne") as "valueOne",
  avg("valueTwo") as "valueTwo"
FROM
  metric_values 
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter("timeInt32") AND
  measurement in($metric)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

spec.rawSql: SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(time, '5m'), avg(value) as value FROM metric WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

spec.title: timeGroup macro 5m with fill(NULL) and null as zero

spec.rawSql: SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(time, '5m', NULL), avg(value) as value FROM metric WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
